== Developer 's guide ==

=== Schema update ===

{{{
 localdb.drop_create(yourschema_map);
}}}

=== Object update ===

{{{
  var person = localdb.from("PERSON").where({id:123}).get();
  person.name = "Gregory";
  localdb.update("PERSON",person).where({id:123}).run();
  // person name is updated.
}}}
